body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0013]/value as T0_age,
  b/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/value as T0_does_the_patient_have_heart,
  b/data[at0001]/items[at0005]/items[at0007]/value as T0_ejection_fraction_ef_40,
  b/data[at0001]/items[at0005]/items[at0008]/value as T0_nyha_class_ii_iv,
  b/data[at0001]/items[at0005]/items[at0009]/value as T0_sinus_rythm,
  b/data[at0001]/items[at0005]/items[at0010]/value as T0_atrial_fibrillation,
  b/data[at0001]/items[at0005]/items[at0011]/value as T0_qrs_width_130_ms,
  b/data[at0001]/items[at0012]/items[at0013]/value as T0_recommendations,
  d/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/value as T0_do_you_want_to_send_a,
  d/data[at0001]/items[at0016]/value as T0_is_interpreter_needed,
  d/data[at0001]/items[at0020]/value as T0_additional_information,
  f/activities[at0001]/description[at0009]/items[at0062]/value as T0_reason_for_referral,
  f/activities[at0001]/description[at0009]/items[at0064]/value as T0_anamnesis,
  f/activities[at0001]/description[at0009]/items[at0152]/value as T0_diagnosis
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.basic_demographic.v1]
    and EVALUATION b[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.svf_heart_failure_assessment.v0]
    and EVALUATION d[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.referral_decision_review.v0]
    and INSTRUCTION f[openEHR-EHR-INSTRUCTION.service_request.v1]
  )
LIMIT
  1
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
